price: Hakika Yeye anajua kauli ya dhaahiri na anajua myafichayo.
arabic: إِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تَكۡتُمُونَ
footnotes: Hakika Mwenyezi Mungu anayajua yote yasemwayo, mnayo yadhihirisha na mnayo yaficha.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innahu yaʿlamu al-jahra mina al-qawli wayaʿlamu mā taktumūna
